text: Irene Tarimo (born 1 October 1964) is a Tanzanian scientist, researcher and educator. == Career == She served as the Head of Department of Environmental Studies and Lindi Regional Director at the Open University of Tanzania. She currently serve as Chairman of the Staff Funds Committee, Open University of Tanzania During 1990's, she helped with the founding of the Tanzania Environmental Conservation Society, which advocates on environmental impacts and the climate crisis, mostly on researches. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Tanzanian people Category:Environmentalists Category:Tanzanian scientists Category:Tanzanian academics Category:Tanzanian educators Category:Tanzanian environmentalists Category:People from Kilimanjaro Region
title: Irene Tarimo
